raw.name: Customer
raw.description: A customer represents a customer account with the shop. Customer accounts store contact information for the customer, saving logged-in customers the trouble of having to provide it at every checkout.

fields.name: acceptsMarketing
fields.description: Indicates whether the customer has consented to be sent marketing material via email.

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: A list of addresses for the customer.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the customer was created.

fields.name: defaultAddress
fields.description: The customer’s default address.

fields.name: displayName
fields.description: The customer’s name, email or phone number.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The customer’s email address.

fields.name: firstName
fields.description: The customer’s first name.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the customer.

fields.name: lastName
fields.description: The customer’s last name.

fields.name: orders
fields.description: The orders associated with the customer.

args.name: query
args.description:
Supported filter parameters:
 - `processed_at`

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The customer’s phone number.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the customer information was updated.

raw.description: Represents a mailing address for customers and shipping.

fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: edges

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: Indicates if there are more pages to fetch.

fields.name: hasPreviousPage
fields.description: Indicates if there are any pages prior to the current page.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of MailingAddressEdge.

raw.name: Order
raw.description: An order is a customer’s completed request to purchase one or more products from a shop. An order is created when a customer completes the checkout process, during which time they provides an email address, billing address and payment information.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.description: The code of the currency used for the payment.

fields.name: customerLocale
fields.description: The locale code in which this specific order happened.

fields.name: customerUrl
fields.description: The order’s URL for a customer.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The customer's email address.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: lineItems
fields.description: List of the order’s line items.

fields.name: orderNumber
fields.description: A unique numeric identifier for the order for use by shop owner and customer.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The customer's phone number.

fields.name: processedAt
fields.description:
The date and time when the order was imported.
This value can be set to dates in the past when importing from other systems.
If no value is provided, it will be auto-generated based on current date and time.

fields.name: shippingAddress
fields.description: The address to where the order will be shipped.

fields.name: subtotalPrice
fields.description: Price of the order before shipping and taxes.

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the order, taxes and discounts included (must be positive).

fields.name: totalRefunded
fields.description: The total amount that has been refunded.

fields.name: totalShippingPrice
fields.description: The total cost of shipping.

fields.name: totalTax
fields.description: The total cost of taxes.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of OrderLineItemEdge.

raw.name: OrderLineItem
raw.description: Represents a single line in an order. There is one line item for each distinct product variant.

fields.name: customAttributes
fields.description: List of custom attributes associated to the line item.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The number of products variants associated to the line item.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the product combined with title of the variant.

fields.name: variant
fields.description: The product variant object associated to the line item.

raw.name: ProductVariant
raw.description: A product variant represents a different version of a product, such as differing sizes or differing colors.

fields.name: available
fields.description: Indicates if the product variant is in stock.

fields.name: availableForSale
fields.description: Indicates if the product variant is available for sale.

fields.name: compareAtPrice
fields.description: The compare at price of the variant. This can be used to mark a variant as on sale, when `compareAtPrice` is higher than `price`.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Image associated with the product variant.

args.name: maxWidth
args.description: Image width in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: maxHeight
args.description: Image height in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: crop
args.description: If specified, crop the image keeping the specified region

args.name: scale
args.description: Image size multiplier retina displays. Must be between 1 and 3

fields.name: price
fields.description: The product variant’s price.

fields.name: product
fields.description: The product object that the product variant belongs to.

fields.name: selectedOptions
fields.description: List of product options applied to the variant.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) associated with the variant.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The product variant’s title.

fields.name: weight
fields.description: The weight of the product variant in the unit system specified with `weight_unit`.

fields.name: weightUnit
fields.description: Unit of measurement for weight.

raw.name: Image
raw.description: Represents an image resource.

fields.name: altText
fields.description: A word or phrase to share the nature or contents of an image.

fields.name: id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the image.

fields.name: src
fields.description: The location of the image as a URL.

raw.name: SelectedOption
raw.description:
Custom properties that a shop owner can use to define product variants.
Multiple options can exist. Options are represented as: option1, option2, option3, etc.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The product option’s name.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The product option’s value.

raw.name: Product
raw.description:
A product represents an individual item for sale in a Shopify store. Products are often physical, but they don't have to be. 
For example, a digital download (such as a movie, music or ebook file) also qualifies as a product, as do services (such as equipment rental, work for hire, customization of another product or an extended warranty).

fields.name: collections
fields.description: List of collections a product belongs to.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the product was created.

fields.name: description
fields.description: Stripped description of the product, single line with HTML tags removed.

args.name: truncateAt
args.description: Truncates string after the given length.

fields.name: descriptionHtml
fields.description: The description of the product, complete with HTML formatting.

fields.name: handle
fields.description:
A human-friendly unique string for the Product automatically generated from its title.
They are used by the Liquid templating language to refer to objects.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: images
fields.description: List of images associated with the product.

args.name: maxWidth
args.description: Image width in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: maxHeight
args.description: Image height in pixels between 1 and 2048

args.name: crop
args.description: If specified, crop the image keeping the specified region

args.name: scale
args.description: Image size multiplier retina displays. Must be between 1 and 3

fields.name: options
fields.description: Lst of custom product options (maximum of 3 per product).

args.name: first
args.description: Truncate the array result to this size

fields.name: productType
fields.description: A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching.

fields.name: publishedAt
fields.description:
The date and time when the product was published to the Online Store channel.
A value of `null` indicates that the product is not published to Online Store.

fields.name: tags
fields.description:
A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching.
Each comma-separated tag has a character limit of 255.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The product’s title.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the product was last modified.

fields.name: variantBySelectedOptions
fields.description:
Find a product’s variant based on its selected options.
This is useful for converting a user’s selection of product options into a single matching variant.
If there is not a variant for the selected options, `null` will be returned.

fields.name: variants
fields.description: List of the product’s variants.

fields.name: vendor
fields.description: The product’s vendor name.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of CollectionEdge.

raw.name: Collection

args.name: truncateAt
args.description: Truncates string after the given length.

fields.name: descriptionHtml

fields.name: handle
fields.description:
A human-friendly unique string for the collection automatically generated from its title.
Limit of 255 characters.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: image
fields.description: Image associated with the collection.

args.name: maxWidth

args.name: crop

args.name: scale
args.description: Image size multiplier retina displays. Must be between 1 and 3

fields.name: products
fields.description: List of products in the collection.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The collection’s name. Limit of 255 characters.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the collection was last modified.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

raw.description:
Custom product property names like "Size", "Color", and "Material".
Products are based on permutations of these options.
A product may have a maximum of 3 options.
255 characters limit each.

fields.description: The corresponding value to the product option name.

raw.name: Checkout
raw.description: A container for all the information required to checkout items and pay.

fields.name: availableShippingRates
fields.description:
The available shipping rates for this Checkout.
Should only be used when checkout `requiresShipping` is `true` and
the shipping address is valid.

fields.name: completedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was completed.

fields.name: createdAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was created.

fields.name: currencyCode
fields.description: The currency code for the Checkout.

fields.name: customAttributes
fields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

fields.name: customer
fields.description: The customer associated with the checkout.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email attached to this checkout.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: lineItems
fields.description: A list of line item objects, each one containing information about an item in the checkout.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The resulting order from a paid checkout.

fields.name: orderStatusUrl
fields.description: The Order Status Page for this Checkout, null when checkout is not completed.

fields.name: paymentDue
fields.description: The amount left to be paid. This is equal to the cost of the line items, taxes and shipping minus discounts and gift cards.

fields.name: ready
fields.description: Whether or not the Checkout is ready and can be completed. Checkouts may have asynchronous operations that can take time to finish. If you want to complete a checkout or ensure all the fields are populated and up to date, polling is required until the value is true.

fields.name: requiresShipping
fields.description: States whether or not the fulfillment requires shipping.

fields.name: shippingAddress
fields.description: The shipping address to where the line items will be shipped.

fields.name: shippingLine
fields.description: Once a shipping rate is selected by the customer it is transitioned to a `shipping_line` object.

fields.name: subtotalPrice
fields.description: Price of the checkout before shipping, taxes, and discounts.

fields.name: taxExempt
fields.description: Specifies if the Checkout is tax exempt.

fields.name: taxesIncluded
fields.description: Specifies if taxes are included in the line item and shipping line prices.

fields.name: totalPrice
fields.description: The sum of all the prices of all the items in the checkout, taxes and discounts included.

fields.name: totalTax
fields.description: The sum of all the taxes applied to the line items and shipping lines in the checkout.

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: The date and time when the checkout was last updated.

fields.name: webUrl
fields.description: The url pointing to the checkout accessible from the web.

fields.name: edges
fields.description: A list of edges.

fields.name: pageInfo
fields.description: Information to aid in pagination.

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: A cursor for use in pagination.

fields.name: node
fields.description: The item at the end of CheckoutLineItemEdge.

raw.name: CheckoutLineItem
raw.description: A single line item in the checkout, grouped by variant and attributes.

fields.name: customAttributes
fields.description: Extra information in the form of an array of Key-Value pairs about the line item.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: The quantity of the line item.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the line item. Defaults to the product's title.

fields.name: variant
fields.description: Product variant of the line item.

raw.name: ShippingRate
raw.description: A shipping rate to be applied to a checkout.

fields.name: handle
fields.description: Human-readable unique identifier for this shipping rate.

fields.name: price
fields.description: Price of this shipping rate.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of this shipping rate.

raw.name: AvailableShippingRates
raw.description: A collection of available shipping rates for a checkout.

fields.name: ready
fields.description:
Whether or not the shipping rates are ready.
The `shippingRates` field is `null` when this value is `false`.
This field should be polled until its value becomes `true`.

fields.name: shippingRates
fields.description: The fetched shipping rates. `null` until the `ready` field is `true`.

raw.name: AppliedGiftCard
raw.description: Details about the gift card used on the checkout.

fields.name: amountUsed
fields.description: The amount that was used taken from the Gift Card by applying it.

fields.name: balance
fields.description: The amount left on the Gift Card.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: lastCharacters
fields.description: The last characters of the Gift Card code

fields.description: The updated checkout object.

fields.description: List of errors that occurred executing the mutation.

fields.description: The checkout on which the payment was applied.

fields.name: payment
fields.description: A representation of the attempted payment.

raw.description: A payment applied to a checkout.

fields.description: The amount of the payment.

fields.description: The billing address for the payment.

fields.name: checkout
fields.description: The checkout to which the payment belongs.

fields.name: creditCard
fields.description: The credit card used for the payment in the case of direct payments.

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.description: An message describing a processing error during asynchronous processing.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier.

fields.name: idempotencyKey
fields.description: A client-side generated token to identify a payment and perform idempotent operations.

fields.name: ready
fields.description: Whether or not the payment is still processing asynchronously.

fields.name: test
fields.description: A flag to indicate if the payment is to be done in test mode for gateways that support it.

fields.name: transaction
fields.description: The actual transaction recorded by Shopify after having processed the payment with the gateway.

fields.name: maskedNumber

raw.name: SelectedOptionInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields required for a selected option.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The product option’s name.

inputFields.name: value
inputFields.description: The product option’s value.

raw.name: CheckoutAttributesUpdateInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields required to update a checkout's attributes.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the checkout.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

inputFields.name: allowPartialAddresses
inputFields.description:
Allows setting partial addresses on a Checkout, skipping the full validation of attributes.
The required attributes are city, province, and country.
Full validation of the addresses is still done at complete time.

raw.name: AttributeInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields required for an attribute.

raw.name: CreditCardPaymentInput
raw.description:
Specifies the fields required to complete a checkout with
a Shopify vaulted credit card payment.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The amount of the payment.

inputFields.name: idempotencyKey
inputFields.description: A unique client generated key used to avoid duplicate charges. When a duplicate payment is found, the original is returned instead of creating a new one.

inputFields.name: billingAddress
inputFields.description: The billing address for the payment.

inputFields.name: vaultId
inputFields.description: The ID returned by Shopify's Card Vault.

inputFields.name: test
inputFields.description: Executes the payment in test mode if possible. Defaults to `false`.

raw.name: MailingAddressInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields accepted to create or update a mailing address.

raw.name: TokenizedPaymentInput
raw.description:
Specifies the fields required to complete a checkout with
a tokenized payment.

inputFields.name: amount
inputFields.description: The amount of the payment.

inputFields.name: idempotencyKey
inputFields.description: A unique client generated key used to avoid duplicate charges. When a duplicate payment is found, the original is returned instead of creating a new one.

inputFields.name: billingAddress
inputFields.description: The billing address for the payment.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: The type of payment token.

inputFields.name: paymentData
inputFields.description: A simple string or JSON containing the required payment data for the tokenized payment.

inputFields.name: test
inputFields.description: Executes the payment in test mode if possible. Defaults to `false`.

inputFields.name: identifier
inputFields.description: Public Hash Key used for AndroidPay payments only.

raw.name: CheckoutCreateInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields required to create a checkout.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The email with which the customer wants to checkout.

inputFields.name: lineItems
inputFields.description: A list of line item objects, each one containing information about an item in the checkout.

inputFields.name: shippingAddress
inputFields.description: The shipping address to where the line items will be shipped.

inputFields.name: note
inputFields.description: The text of an optional note that a shop owner can attach to the checkout.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: A list of extra information that is added to the checkout.

inputFields.name: allowPartialAddresses
inputFields.description:
Allows setting partial addresses on a Checkout, skipping the full validation of attributes.
The required attributes are city, province, and country.
Full validation of addresses is still done at complete time.

raw.name: CheckoutLineItemInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields to create a line item on a checkout.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Extra information in the form of an array of Key-Value pairs about the line item.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the line item.

inputFields.name: variantId
inputFields.description: The identifier of the product variant for the line item.

raw.name: CheckoutLineItemUpdateInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields to update a line item on the checkout.

inputFields.name: variantId
inputFields.description: The variant identifier of the line item.

inputFields.name: quantity
inputFields.description: The quantity of the line item.

inputFields.name: customAttributes
inputFields.description: Extra information in the form of an array of Key-Value pairs about the line item.

raw.name: CustomerAccessTokenCreateInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields required to create a customer access token.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The email associated to the customer.

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: The login password to be used by the customer.

raw.name: CustomerActivateInput
raw.description: Specifies the input fields required to activate a customer.

inputFields.name: activationToken
inputFields.description: The activation token required to activate the customer

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: The login password used by the customer.

raw.name: CustomerCreateInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields required to create a new Customer.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The customer’s first name.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The customer’s last name.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The customer’s email.

inputFields.name: phone
inputFields.description: The customer’s phone number.

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: The login password used by the customer.

inputFields.name: acceptsMarketing
inputFields.description: Indicates whether the customer has consented to be sent marketing material via email.

raw.name: CustomerResetInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields required to reset a Customer’s password.

inputFields.name: resetToken
inputFields.description: The reset token required to reset the customer’s password.

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: New password that will be set as part of the reset password process.

raw.name: CustomerUpdateInput
raw.description: Specifies the fields required to update the Customer information.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The customer’s first name.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The customer’s last name.

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: The customer’s email.

inputFields.name: phone
inputFields.description: The customer’s phone number.

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: The login password used by the customer.

inputFields.name: acceptsMarketing
inputFields.description: Indicates whether the customer has consented to be sent marketing material via email.

raw.description: Associates a customer to the checkout.

args.description: The ID of the checkout.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The customer access token of the customer to associate.

raw.name: checkoutCustomerDisassociate
raw.description: Disassociates the current checkout customer from the checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

raw.name: checkoutEmailUpdate
raw.description: Updates the email on an existing checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

args.name: email
args.description: The email to update the checkout with.

raw.name: checkoutGiftCardApply
raw.description: Applies a gift card to an existing checkout using a gift card code.

args.name: giftCardCode
args.description: The code of the gift card to apply on the checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

raw.name: checkoutGiftCardRemove
raw.description: Removes an applied gift card from the checkout.

args.name: appliedGiftCardId
args.description: The ID of the Applied Gift Card to remove from the Checkout

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the Checkout

raw.name: checkoutLineItemsAdd
raw.description: Adds a list of line items to a checkout.

args.name: lineItems
args.description: A list of line item objects to add to the checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

raw.name: checkoutLineItemsRemove
raw.description: Removes line items from an existing checkout

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: the checkout on which to remove line items

args.name: lineItemIds
args.description: line item ids to remove

raw.name: checkoutLineItemsUpdate
raw.description: Updates line items on a checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: the checkout on which to update line items.

args.name: lineItems
args.description: line items to update.

raw.name: checkoutShippingAddressUpdate
raw.description: Updates the shipping address of an existing checkout.

args.name: shippingAddress
args.description: The shipping address to where the line items will be shipped.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

raw.name: checkoutShippingLineUpdate
raw.description: Updates the shipping lines on an existing checkout.

args.name: checkoutId
args.description: The ID of the checkout.

args.name: shippingRateHandle
args.description: A concatenation of a Checkout’s shipping provider, price, and title, enabling the customer to select the availableShippingRates.

raw.name: customerAccessTokenCreate
raw.description:
Creates a customer access token.
The customer access token is required to modify the customer object in any way.

raw.name: customerAccessTokenDelete
raw.description: Permanently destroys a customer access token.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

raw.name: customerAccessTokenRenew
raw.description: Renews a customer access token.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

raw.name: customerActivate
raw.description: Activates a customer.

args.name: id
args.description: Specifies the customer to activate.

raw.name: customerAddressCreate
raw.description: Creates a new address for a customer.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

args.name: address
args.description: The customer mailing address to create.

raw.name: customerAddressDelete
raw.description: Permanently deletes the address of an existing customer.

args.name: id
args.description: Specifies the address to delete.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

raw.name: customerAddressUpdate
raw.description: Updates the address of an existing customer.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

args.name: id
args.description: Specifies the customer address to update.

args.name: address
args.description: The customer’s mailing address.

raw.name: customerCreate
raw.description: Creates a new customer.

raw.name: customerRecover
raw.description: Sends a reset password email to the customer, as the first step in the reset password process.

args.name: email
args.description: The email address of the customer to recover.

raw.name: customerReset
raw.description: Resets a customer’s password with a token received from `CustomerRecover`.

args.name: id
args.description: Specifies the customer to reset.

raw.name: customerUpdate
raw.description: Updates an existing customer.

args.name: customerAccessToken
args.description: The access token used to identify the customer.

args.name: customer
args.description: The customer object input.
